title: Base Schema
description: A general base schema for defining any DNA entity, such as an Actor, Action, or Resource.

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, typically a UUID or semantic key.

key.description: Programmatic identifier for the entity, suitable for use in code, APIs, and configuration files.

type.description: The classification or role of this entity (e.g., 'Actor', 'Action', or 'Resource').

description.description: A detailed explanation of the purpose or behavior of this entity.

examples.description: Optional example representations of this resource.
